release_text:
VA: Return to the Fog presented proudly by Horrordelic.

If you think you had left Silent Hill you were wrong. You just came back from the Otherworld, only to return to heavy creeping fog embracing you.

There is a hole in the ground. Will you jump down into the Abyss?

15 new Dark Psychedelic visions twisted into the fog of Silent Hill are waiting for you.
credits:
Compiled by Psytanic
Mastering by Krono Audio
Artwork by Kathryn Brooks
Released By Horrordelic
Release 23th July 2023
tracklist: 11. FluroNeuro vs Inverk - Laugh Now Cry Later 165

album_name: Tandav Nritya - The Second Chapter: Stithi
release_text:
Chapter 2 of the Tandav Nritya series compiled by Cosmic BlueMoon (India). The dance is a pictorial allegory of the five principal manifestations of eternal energy (Srishti - Sthiti - Samhara - Tirodhana - Anugraha).

This is Sthiti (Preservation, Support).
credits:
Compiled By Cosmic Blue Moon (India)

Artwork By Antikriz (Norway)

Mastering Krono Audio (Brazil) - Except Track 3 By Basaltic
tracklist: 4. Mazo Sadu - Night on Earth 151 BPM

release_text:
Playing this album will take you straight to the fog and horrors of Silent Hill, and there is no going back until the end of the last track. 

All 14 tracks are set in this creepy setting.

Now is the time to grab a flashlight and a wooden plank with a nail in it, as the door that wakes in darkness opens into nightmares.
credits:
Artwork by Kathryn Brooks

Compiled by Psytanic

Mastering by Krono Audio
tracklist: 13. Efect Mushroom - Mumm-Ra El Inmortal (175 BPM) 10:50
14. Illumicorp feat. Mohinia - Silent Memes (200 BPM) 08:21

release_text:
Horrordelic Proudly Presents the debut EP from Diabolical Orchestra (India).

As the composer tell us this story: When I was wandering in the forest I found an old CD of symphonies. I came home, played it on my speakers and I was mesmerized by the music. It made me feel all kinds of emotions and it took me to a state of meditation. I was astonished and inspired by the symphony and decide to add some elements in it to make it more emotional, ecstatic and cinematic.

I am happily presenting you all my my debut EP: Bacterial Symphonies. The music is cooked in order to make people in the dance floor experience a journey of emotions.
credits:
Music by Gokul Kannan (Diabolical Orchestra)

Text Layout by Antikriz

Mastering Krono Audio

release_text:
Horrordelic proudly presents the debut full length album 'Psychic Miasma' by Abgrund B.

Abgrund B is a dark psychedelic music project by Tim Zur from Berlin (Germany). 

He wants to resemble the mood, the sound and variety of raves in urban concrete basements in his tracks.
credits:
Music by Abgrund B

Mastering by Soulexpander

Cover artwork by Sem

album_name: Tandav Nritya - The First Chapter: Srishti
release_text:
Horrordelic proudly presents a new series compiled By Cosmic BlueMoon (India) called Tandava Nritya.

This is the 5th VA compiled by Cosmic Bluemoon, another legendary journey through psychedelic trance of the modern age.

The dance performed by the god Shiva is the divine art form. Shiva's Tandava is an energetic dance that is the source of the cycle of creation, preservation and dissolution.

This first chapter is Srishti. Srishti means Creation and Evolution, the first part of the five manifestations of eternal energy.
credits:
Compiled by Cosmic BlueMoon (India)

Artwork by Antikriz (Norway)

Mastering track 1 by Krono Audio (Brazil), track 2-10 WaveSavage (Brazil)
tracklist: 10. Delirious Moon - Obey the Morza 170 BPM 09:27

release_text:
Horrordelic Proudly presents a new EP named Mental Chaos from Yetzirah! This EP is about the chaos in humanity and all the chaos inside us.

Yetzirah is the dark experimental Psycore project by Mateus Henrique from Itumbiara in the State of Goiás (Brazil). Yetzirah brings you a creative dark accelerated Psycore sound.

The environments and dark psychedelic atmospheres will make your mind and body go on a ride you can never forget...
credits:
Music By Yetzirah (Mateus Henrique) and DarkFractal (Felipe Mendonça dos Santos) (Brazil)

Artwork Layout By Antikriz (Norway)

Mastering By Darkside Generation Mastering (Switzerland)

release_text:
What happens if you mix some hardcore rolling baselines, thick kicks, a good amount of madness and a bunch of memes? Nobody really knows - or cares.

 Anyway here is a new EP from N,N with a good blend of everything ;)

Let me introduce it as one of my good friends did back in the 90s:

 

 I was chopping berries, shredding fruit, demolishing nature - just blending away. For years been serving my purpose, by compressing fruits into delicious drinkable beverages. 

 One power overload, and you’re gone. I understand what Eminem meant with “one shot” now. But it is too late, I have been thrashed away and is now long gone.

 

 I indeed, miss being a blender.

  Enjoy the menu!
credits:
Kykep (Svilen Dimitrov) 

Psyntific Alien (Anmol Kaushal)

 N,N (Magnus Leonhardt) 

 MogliCore (Ionut-Alexandru Dimoiu) 

  Mastering By DarkSide Generation Mastering 

 Artwork By Antikriz 

 Released By Horrordelic Records © ℗
tracklist: 2. King Snow White - Featuring Kykep, MogliCore (210BPM) 08:35

release_text:
Horrordelic proudly presents Gloomy Phantom: Past, Present and Evil. A collection of all tracks released at Horrordelic since 2013.

This collection is for those diehard old fans that want a complete collection, as well as any  new fan of this genre. If you  just started to dive deep into Darkpsy, be sure to check out this and let the darkness embrace you (once again).

10 years of True Darkpsy releases here at Horrordelic. Gloomy Phantom has always been one of the pioneers in the Darkpsy scene and everyone can feel the presence and the Darkness this man brings to the floor and to your Mind.
credits: All tracks By Timo Coerdt. Artwork by Psycholouis. Synthetic Forest Remix: Sascha Barth. Holix track: Mattias Lindholm. Layout: Antikriz.

release_text:
Horrordelic Proudly presents the debut EP from Ponomi (Switzerland). Here is the sampler for the upcoming EP.

 The idea of the project comes from a big fan of Black Metal who fell under the spell of Psycore. To combine the two musical styles to create a vision close to his dark heart. 

The tracks featured here are all stories that got a story to tell, you will experience life, death and nature as we are part of the never ending cycle.
credits:
All sounds by Ponomi 

 Layout: Antikriz

release_text:
The follow up to the still fresh “Accession of the Dark Ages Volume 1”, here comes Fakhiru with 10 new tracks for Volume 2! 

A steady rise in intensity and insanity. True experimental psychedelic soundscapes, all with a powerful edge and atmosphere. 

Delve into madness and hit the play button!

New killer VA from Horrordelic released in the end of 2022. Fakhiru returns to compiling and it is a true Darkpsy Journey for real!

 10 tracks all ready to go, in pure classic Darkpsy atmosphere! Get ready to blow your brainz out and trip your mind all the way, out of this year, into the new.
credits: Compiled by Fakhiru. Artwork by Psycholouis. Mastering by Darkside Generation Mastering. Released by Horrordelic

release_text:
Horrordelic proudly presents a full length album from Wave Savage.

We are welcomed to the Psychedelic Ritual, deep inside the ancient forests of Brazil. 8 new unreleased tracks ranging from 124 - 188 Bpm will get you through hyperspace, back to the ancients and back home - All in an hour!

 You and your fellow travelers will experience new and old memories flow freely, emotions and energy rising and lowering, all while connecting through the sounds and movements. All tracks are in a deep psychedelic state, and so can you ... 

Turn up the volume, close your eyes and tune your body and mind to the rhythm.
credits: Music, artwork and mastering by Wave Savage (Eduardo Menezes).Released by Horrordelic.

release_text:
The SpaceYard EP is the culmination of 12 years of musical composing from Psytuga.

 Always with the intention and search for the perfect sound.

 With these 5 new tracks you will experience his definition and expression of dark forest Psychedelic music.

 Psytuga thanks all those supporting him during all these years, and a special thanks to Horrordelic Records and Fabio (Zoomorfos) for participating in this production.
credits:
Music by: Psytuga (Paulo Jorge Alves Batista dos Santos)

Mastering: Darkside Generation Mastering

Artwork: Antikriz

release_text:
From Belgium we have the debut full length release from DistortedAtmosFear, Force Fields. 

 It is a fast paced all-in journey through psytrance and darkpsy, with elements of breakcore and hardcore!

 After first visiting Goa parties he got inspired to make his own music, and he started at age 15! Now 15 years later, this killer album, almost 4 years in the making, is getting a release to the world! 

 Get in your spacesuit, buckle-up and crank up the volume!
credits: Music by Rob Quick. Darkside Generation Mastering. Artwork by Carrol McDonald & Antikriz

release_text:
Horrordelic Proudly presents a new VA, celebrating our 10 Years in the scene. 

 The Realm of The Death: 
 The ancient Greeks believed in an underworld to which the souls of the dead journeyed. It was known by names such as Hades or Erebus which have become synonymous with the concept of ‘Hell’.

The Underworld was a structured place. The souls of the dead were sent to various realms based on how they were judged: blameless heroes to Elysium, the evil to Tartarus and those who were neither good nor bad to the Fields of Asphodel. To safely travel from the world of the living to that of Hades, the soul needed to cross the Styx (the River of Hate) on a boat steered by a grim ferryman known as Charon.
credits: Compiled By Yamaraja. Mastering By Komfuzius, Track 3: Mastering by Dark Spectrum Lab. Artwork By Artistry.

release_text:
`Art is again becoming an explosion when releasing the boundaries of what's commercially accepted & mainstream`

Yata-Garasu went out again searching the scene for upcoming & established talents. In this 2. edition he is going all in for you to get you the latest and greatest talents in this movement of sound. This is the middle part of the trilogy that is “Art is an Explosion” … Be sure to get them all..

We are really digging these sounds, hoping you will too! So Enjoy & Blast hard! Much respect to all artists involved. Go check out all their individual Sounds & experience a true artistic world. They all deserve to be heard and supported..

So as always Yata will leave you with these words: Open your mind, close your eyes, press play and fly away. Yours truly Yata-Garasu

Psytuga aka Paulo Santos is a Portugese producer that leads us into old lusitanian Forests., showing us their deep and dark side with our frequencies and rhythms. Ganduna Calculus means in old Celtic: Dark Forest…

Turn up the volume, get into the vibe and walk into the dark forest.

release_text:
Horrordelic records Presents 10. February - 2020 :The debut album from producer Abyssal Void (Brazil). 

This entity feeds on the purest dreams of good people, It transforms your best dreams into the worst things you can imagine. Each track of this album has a different emotion and feeling… Feelings that I felt over the years. Each dream I have is represented on the tracks.

 In his own words he will present you his journey:

“Babayaga” is an old fairytale that was created decades ago. This tale is about an old Creature which comes from the depth of Hell, the son of Dark Magic … Pure and hungry...

The tracks from 1-12 represent the fight between good and evil, losing the sanity...  Visited by my old friend Baba I was influenced by energies beyond my understanding, performing this highest level of magic and active meditation to bring devastation and healing. This is Abyssal Void.
credits: Music by Pedro Caetano. Mastered By Thiago Pinheiro. Cover art work by matheus felipe
tracklist: 5. Abyssal Void & Thiago Pinheiro - ROBOTIC MOSS 164Bpm 16:38

Art truly becomes an explosion when you release the boundaries of what's commercially accepted & mainstream.

This compilation is a personal choice of what Yata think's are some of the artists that deserve much more attention & exposure.

 These are artists that define the words of a true artist.

 Art is an explosion, and so will all these tracks do to you. 

Each 1 of these songs will explode your head & leave you wanting for more.

 So as always i'll leave you with these words:

Open your mind, close your eyes, press play and fly away.

 Yours truly Yata-Garasu

release_text:
Yata-Garasu - Shiki (15'th Anniversary & 4'th Solo Album) 

This Is a special 15 year celebration of his work in the scene, listen to his own words below: Nyanpasu. What can I say ... 15 years of the Yata-Garasu project.

 15 years of hard work.

 15 years of blood , sweat & lot's of tears. 

 ... 

 I would like to thank every single person that has been, is & will be in my life to come... You all know who you are & you all will be remembered forever & ever.

 Horrordelic records , My family (Kriz , Edel & Johnny).

 Anime... Without anime , I wouldn't be writing all this now.  Without anime , there would be no Yata-Garasu. Without anime there would be no Paul Hoeylaerts. 

But the biggest thank you goes out to YOU. For listening, experiencing, following & supporting my music. Even if you just tuned in to this project after 15 years ... THANK YOU!  

Even if you are listening & following my music since the very start... THANK YOU! 

This album is my 4th solo album. And with every new solo album I feel that I have pushed my Emotionpsy to the next level. Well it sure happened again with this one, for my 15 years of this project... I feel I have reached another level of emotions , atmospheres and experimental psytrance music.

 I would like to leave you all with these words yet again : 

'You should enjoy the little detours to the fullest. Because that's where you'll find the things more important than what you want.'

 OPEN YOUR MIND, CLOSE YOUR EYES, PRESS PLAY & FLY AWAY ... Yours truly Paul Hoeylaerts.
credits: Mastering Yata-Garasu. Artwork Antikriz
tracklist: 1. Intro - While she’s adorable, she bares fangs 03:48
9. You should enjoy the little detours to the fullest. Because that's where you'll find the things more important than what you want 210bpm 07:12
10. Birthday song for this fucked up world 240bpm 06:46

release_text:
The first VA compiled by Hexmästaren for Horrordelic.

 From this Pagan Altar some truly pagan offerings are ready for you. Always Free Download here! 

Dive deep into the fabrics of the world with these 10 journeys:

release_text:
With every single V.A Yata-Garasu compiles, he searches for great upcoming talent and well established artists to combine into what he thinks are some of today's finest. With his V.A's he always tries to push new talent together with the established ones, to get the people to recognize and see how talented these upcoming artists truly are. 

 And with this one it's no different. 

 Again he presents you with 9 tracks of 9 different styles, different patterns, different artists, that show you a mere echo of what they have in store for you for the future. We hope you like Yata-Garasu`s next V.A as much as we @ Horrordelic do, so as always - close your eyes , open your mind press play and fly away - to these echoes from the dark. 

 Keep it real - Keep it original - Keep experimenting.

 Thank you for the support & thanks to all the artists involved.
credits: Compiled By Yata-Garasu. Mastering By SooSpicey. Artwork By Antikriz.
tracklist: 5. Yata-Garasu - I'll Always Repeat This Moment 172bpm 08:00
7. Tzu-Jan - Kuristina, a journey through Time can be Confusing 185bpm 05:55

A symbiosis between dark psychedelic atmospheres and mechanical frequencies.

The connection between light and dark, creating a twilight of emotions.

 A deep journey through the mind of Source Error, who implied his vision of modern dark psychedelic sound in his debut EP.

Mesmerizing soundscapes combined with impulsive straight forward bass lines, create a unique style, guaranteed to drill your brain.

 From the deepest inner abyss to the highest physical states, this EP is meant to break the borders that surround mankind.
